title: Played off my chat ban but still says something
body: says You are ineligible to earn loot due to previous behavioral restrictions. and I don't know how to fix it. I can't get chest anymore even if I get an s- or above. Please help.

replies.body:
Riot understands their system is flawed, but instead of fixing it, they add a new restriction..... because maybe this will work.

I had 1 game get reported, 10 game chat restriction, 20+ games no loot and still going.

That seems like it's working?
You had a lot more than a single game reported. I addressed this in a previous thread.

That's an intentional restriction to incentivize you to reform your behavior in the long run. The only way to get rid of it is to not get reported much.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463-Hextech-Crafting-Restrictions
^Read more about it here.

This.

Here is the relevant section:

> Once your punishment ends, you'll enter a reform period, during which you'll remain ineligible to earn Hextech Chests and Keys. Ending this reform period requires consistent displays of good sportsmanship. Your reform period isn't over after a specific number of games, or after a certain date, but is completely dependent upon your behavior.

Only thing you can do is stop buying fucking RP. If you give this company money and it sees its still raking in billions do you think they will change this sytem thats apparently working? do you think theyll introduce solo queue? you spend money on a broken game its YOUR problem when you run into these things.
